page.title: 05ATTITUDES - UNEMPLOYMENT
page.content: OVER 60'S - Many blame Government - closure of Dockyard heavy blow- but Rochester still appears relatively affluent. SELF EMPLOYED MAN - Started business with redundancy money.Insisted jobs available although low status and low pay.Unemployed should try to help themselves. UNMARRIED MOTHER - Has to stay home to look after 2 children.Believes she should be payed for working at home. MALE WEST INDIAN STEEL ERECTOR - Many friends made redundant from Dockyard. Believes Rochester badly hit by high unemployment. UNEMPLOYED SCHOOL LEAVERS - Some blame Government.A few blame themselves.Some spend most of their time looking for jobs.Others resign to situation - especially those without work for more than one year.Most want more money.
